mapper.insert: insert into member (username, password, name, email, phone, enabled) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{enabled})
insert into member_role (username, id) values (#{username}, (select id from role where roleName=#{roleName}))
insert into memberFiles (username, fileName, oriName) values(#{username}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, R.* FROM member M LEFT JOIN member_role MR ON M.username = MR.username left join role R ON MR.id = R.id WHERE M.username=#{username}
